researchHistory: Established in 1950, ABC University has a rich research tradition.
admissionProcess: 1. Submit an online application. 2. Attend an entrance exam. 3. Interview with faculty.

eventsDetails.Orientation Day: An event to welcome new students and provide information about college life.
eventsDetails.Career Fair: A fair where students can explore job opportunities and network with companies.
eventsDetails.Annual Fest: A grand celebration with cultural performances, games, and food stalls.

researchWorks.title: Advancements in Renewable Energy
researchWorks.summary: This research explores new breakthroughs in renewable energy sources.

researchWorks.title: The Impact of Climate Change on Biodiversity
researchWorks.summary: Examines the effects of climate change on various species and ecosystems.
